name: Tbbr
description: Make the most recently opened tab the first tab.

move-to-first.description: Move the current tab to the first position

toggle-pin.description: Toggle pin state of the current tab

close-all-old-tabs.description: Close all tabs that haven't been opened after a configurable time

clear-pick-mode.description: Clear pick mode and restore tab titles

go-to-last-tab.description: Go to the last used tab

close-pick.description: Select a tab to close by letter

go-to-following-tab.description: Go to the tab to the right of the current one

go-to-preceeding-tab.description: Go to the tab to the left of the current one

go-to-first-tab.description: Go to the first tab in the tab list

go-to-last-tab-in-list.description: Go to the last tab in the tab list

close-all-preceding-tabs.description: Close all tabs to the left of the current tab

close-all-following-tabs.description: Close all tabs to the right of the current tab

close-all-except-current.description: Close all tabs except the current one

toggle-countdown-timers.description: Show/hide time until tab is considered 'old'

move-tab-left.description: Move the current tab to the left

move-tab-right.description: Move the current tab to the right
